ss.gurmukhi: A`Kw ivc kjlw pwieAw hY, jo mn nUM moihq krdw hY Aqy m`Qy auqy iSMgRP dI ibMdI ibrwj rhI hY।

verse.gurmukhi: twf Bujwn bnRhI kit kyihr pwien nUpr kI Duin bwjY ]
verse.unicode: ਟਾਡ ਭੁਜਾਨ ਬਨ੍ਰਹੀ ਕਟਿ ਕੇਹਿਰ ਪਾਇਨ ਨੂਪਰ ਕੀ ਧੁਨਿ ਬਾਜੈ ॥

en.bdb: She had put antimony in her eyes and a round mark on her forehead, her arms were beautiful, the waist was slim like a lion and there was sound of anklets from her feet

ss.gurmukhi: bwhvw ivc bwjU-bMd bMnRhy hoey hn, Syr vrgw pqlw lk hY Aqy pYrw ivc Jwjrw dy vjx dI Dun ho rhI hY।
ss.unicode: ਬਾਹਵਾ ਵਿਚ ਬਾਜੂ-ਬੰਦ ਬੰਨ੍ਰਹੇ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ, ਸ਼ੇਰ ਵਰਗਾ ਪਤਲਾ ਲਕ ਹੈ ਅਤੇ ਪੈਰਾ ਵਿਚ ਝਾਜਰਾ ਦੇ ਵਜਣ ਦੀ ਧੁਨ ਹੋ ਰਹੀ ਹੈ।

bdb.gurmukhi: bwhvw ivc bwjU-bMd bMnRhy hoey hn, Syr vrgw pqlw lk hY Aqy pYrw ivc Jwjrw dy vjx dI Dun ho rhI hY।

verse.gurmukhi: hwr gry mukqwhl ky geI nMd duAwrih kMs kY kwjY ]
verse.unicode: ਹਾਰ ਗਰੇ ਮੁਕਤਾਹਲ ਕੇ ਗਈ ਨੰਦ ਦੁਆਰਹਿ ਕੰਸ ਕੈ ਕਾਜੈ ॥

en.bdb: Wearing a necklace of gems, she reached at the door of Nand in order to perform the task assigned by Kansa

verse.gurmukhi: bws subws bsI sB hI qn Awnn mY sis koitk lwjY ]84]

en.bdb: The fragrance emanating from her body spread in all the four directions and seeing her face even the moon felt shy.84.

ss.gurmukhi: auqm sugMDI swry Sihr ivc vs rhI hY Aqy mUMh (dI suMdrqw qoN) kRoVw cMdRmy SrimMdy huMdy hn ]84]

verse.gurmukhi: mo godI dY dUD ko hovY sB ko BUp ]86]
verse.unicode: ਮੋ ਗੋਦੀ ਦੈ ਦੂਧ ਕੋ ਹੋਵੈ ਸਭ ਕੋ ਭੂਪ ॥੮੬॥

en.bdb: “O mother! I have come to know that you have given birth to a unique child, give him to me so that I may cause him to drink my milk, because this promising child will become the emperor of all.”86.

ss.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) myrI god (ivc dy mYN) du`D dyvw! (myry du`D dy pRqwp nwl auh) sB dw rwjw ho jwvygw ]86]

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) myrI god (ivc dy mYN) du`D dyvw! (myry du`D dy pRqwp nwl auh) sB dw rwjw ho jwvygw ]86]

verse.gurmukhi: ijau ggVI qumrI qn lwie kY qyl ley quc Cwf kY pIno ]87]

en.bdb: Krishna sucked her blood (instead of milk) with his mouth alongwith his life-force like the pressing and filtering the oil from the colocynth.87.

transliteration.ipa: beG t͡ʃəlɪjɔ d̪ɪd͡ʒ Gɔkʊl kɔ bəsʊd̪eʋ məhɑn kəhi sɔei mɑni.
transliteration.ur: بےگ چلےو دج گوکل کو بسدےو مهان کهیِ سوای مانیِ ۔۔
